Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani scored a close-in strike to give France the lead.
Ousmane Dembele scored with a left-footed drive to secure France's victory.
Youssouf Fofana replaced N'Golo Kanté in the 90+4 minute.
Post-Match Reflections: France rebounded from their loss to Italy with a shutout victory over Belgium.
Kevin De Bruyne appeared frustrated during the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Groupama Stadium in Lyon, France, with an attendance of 42,358.
France had 46.5% possession while Belgium had 53.5%.
France had 9 shots on goal compared to Belgium's 4.
France made 4 saves while Belgium made 7.
